DataInspector.Instructions: Click to expand, right click to copy path (copied to clipboard also if browser permissions allow).
DataInspector.IDValue:
ID: {id}
Click to copy to clipboard

Settings.AllowEditingHint: Allows simple editing by double clicking the values. This affects all users. Responsibility is on you if you break something with this.
Settings.AllowEditingUnsupportedHint: Allows editing certain additional data types (e.g. base objects and arrays). Only delete option is provided.
Settings.AllowUsersHint: If enabled, users have access to the module.
Settings.TooltipHint: Display tooltips with more straightforward display of per line information, such as complete path.
Settings.IncludeFunctionsHint: Include functions in data tree by default.
Settings.ResultQualityHint: Default search result quality. Higher is stricter matching, lower is less so.
Settings.StrictnessHint: Search strictness. Left is more lax, right is more strict.

Editor.TokenWarning: Altering override data may temporarily break the actor. Re-opening the sheet should be enough to fix it.
Editor.TypeWarning: You're changing the datatype. Be careful!

Data.Legend:
Roll data – used for formulas.
Derived data – as seen by the system, macros, modules, etc.
Source data – permanently stored data.
